mapper.insert: insert into EV_user (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_province, user_city) values (#{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_province}, #{user_city})
mapper.select: select count(*) from EV_user where user_id=#{user_id}
select count(*) from EV_user where user_id=#{user_id} and user_password=#{user_password}
